## LoaderOptions.basisTranscoderPath property

A path to that contains the basis universal library. e.g: `https://unpkg.com/three@0.129.0/examples/js/libs/basis` - Default: `undefined`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
basisTranscoderPath?: string;
```
